attributes.action: Change the law regarding the time restriction on bringing a due care and attention prosecution, failing to stop and report and careless driving prosecution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My niece Olivia Whiteside was knocked down on the 27th July 2006 and was killed as a result of her injuries.   The driver who the police have identified as the driver cannot be prosecuted because of the time restrictions under the current law.  
This is appalling and this piece of legislation needs to be changed.

It can take the police several months to gather their evidence to bring a prosecution and when that time limit has expired it leaves the family devastated that no action can be taken even though there is overwhelming evidence.

The Law needs to change.
